Providers¶

CSV Provider¶

class providers.csv_provider.CSVProvider(c)¶

Provides data for either data driven scripting or as oracles from a csv file

Params c:name of csv file locates in support/csv directory
randomRow()¶

Gets a random row from the provider

Returns:List

Django Provider¶

class providers.django_providers.DjangoProvider¶

Uses Django’s Models to access the database

get_random_user()¶

Gets a random user from the provider

Returns:Dictionary

class providers.sqlite3_provider.DBProvider¶

SQLite3 powered provider

get_random_user()¶
